mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projectSummary where (deltag <> '1' or deltag is null) order by createTime asc

select a.id, a.projectNum, a.projectName, a.designPhase, a.principalId, b.username principal, a.chiefEngineerId, c.username chiefEngineer, a.startTime, a.stopTime, a.leftTime, a.deltag, a.createTime, a.updateTime from projectSummary a, user b, user c where a.principalId = b.id and a.chiefEngineerId = c.id and (a.deltag <> '1' or a.deltag is null) and (b.deltag <> '1' or b.deltag is null) and (c.deltag <> '1' or c.deltag is null) and a.id = #{id}
